UIDescription:
[color=YellowGreen][size=3][b]Description[/b][/size][/color]

Molinari allows the player to easily "salvage" items directly from the inventory by holding down the [color=#f6f8fa]Alt[/color] key and clicking on the item in their bags, instead of dealing with the tradeskill UI, spellbook, macros or actions.

The following "salvaging" is supported:

[list]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=51005]Milling[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=31252]Prospecting[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=13262]Disenchanting[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=1804]Lockpicking[/url][list]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=312890]Skeleton Pinkie[/url] (Mechagnome racial)
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=323427]Kevin's Keyring[/url] (Necrolord soulbind ability)
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/items/name:key?filter=86;2;0]Blacksmithing picks[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/items/name:lock?filter=86;7;0]Jewelcrafting picks[/url]
[*][url=https://wowhead.com/items?filter=107:99;0:15;lockpick:0]Inscription picks[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/items/consumables?filter=107:99;0:5;lock:0#0+2+18]Engineering picks[/url][/list]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=382374]Scrapping[/url]
[*][url=https://www.wowhead.com/spell=395696]Crushing[/url][/list]

In addition, Molinari also works for lockpicking in the trade window.

[color=YellowGreen][size=3][b]Translations[/b][/size][/color]

If you want to help translate Molinari, please use this form on GitHub:
[url=https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/issues/new?assignees=p3lim&labels=enhancement%2Ctranslation&template=translate.yaml&title=Translation%3A+]https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/issues/new?template=translate.yaml[/url]

[color=YellowGreen][size=3][b]Feedback & issues[/b][/size][/color]

If you would like to report a bug or contribute to the project, please visit GitHub:
[url=https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/issues/new/choose]https://github.com/p3lim-wow/Molinari/issues/new/choose[/url]
